title: Leebein Electric Spin Scrubber, Upgraded Electric Scrubber for Cleaning, Spin Scrubber with Long Handle & 8 Replaceable Brush Heads, Remote Control Shower Cleaner Brush for Bathroom, Floor
features: 🛀🏻【Upgraded Electric Spin Scrubber】Struggle with those stubborn stains, soap scum, and grout that are hard to clean in your Bathroom? Don't worry, Leebein upgraded electric spin scrubber with a large torque of 50KG specializes in deep cleaning of mold & dirt in the shower & bathroom, especially for bathtubs, sinks, tiles, grout, floors, walls, kitchen, glass, etc. No longer worry about the product stopping working due to excessive pressure during use.

👍【Remote Control Cleaning Brush 】The one and only remote control cordless cleaning brush in the market, allows you to adjust the speed or turn the machine on/off without bending or kneeling, saving your knees and back. Besides, you can also control the machine with the controller on the short handle.

🌀【Two Spin Mode and 4 Adjustable Angles】Leebein YMG-820 spin scrubber has two 2 adjustable spin speeds(350RPM/450RMP) 4 adjustable angles (90°, 120°,150, 180°), which makes it perfect for tackling tough cleaning tasks in your bathroom, bathtub, stone tile floors, grout, grooves, and toilets.

⚡️【One Charge to Clean the Whole House】Adapted upgraded 2500mAh*2 battery and USB-C fast charge tech, Leebein electric bathroom scrubber fully charges in 4 hours which lasts 60-90 min, far enough to clean your entire house. Besides, you can check the remaining battery by the LED light on the machine.

💎【Durable Bristles, Anti-Scratch Brush Heads】Leebein YMG-820 electric spin scrubber includes 8 durable and recoverable brush heads for various scenarios. Dome brush for the tub; Flat brush for surfaces like tile floor, wall, and pool; corner brush is great for cleaning grout, faucets, and edges; cloth brush for wooden floor and furniture cleaning; sponge pad is for the window. A tip: please sprinkle hot water on the bristle if it gets bent, and it will be recovered.

👪【Unmatched Lifetime Support】Discover the unrivaled quality of our scrubber, supported by a lifetime warranty and dependable customer assistance. Our dedicated team is readily available to address any concerns within 48 hours. The electric cleaning brush boasts a user-friendly three-part design, comprising a main unit, extendable handle, and brush head, ensuring effortless usage and convenient storage.
